project.description: This job will redeploy the qa2.cloud - it will wipe all machines.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: WITHREBOOT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable reboots during the mkcloud run (incl. crowbar and compute node).

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud Staging

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: libvirt_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: possible values: kvm, xen, hyperv, [ lxc, qemu ]

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: networkingplugin
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: neutron networking plugin: openvswitch|linuxbridge Default: openvswitch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the QA cloud server (we have 2,3,4)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hacloud
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: By default we don't want HA configured and installed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: clusterconfig
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: HA configuration for clusters. Make sense only if ha=1

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Default nodenumber is 7 as the qa2 cloud is the default here and it has 7 nodes. Cloud qa3 has 8 nodes

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: runner_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The runner must be qa_crowbarsetup.sh file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: commands
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: All the steps that needs to be completed to have cloud installed
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: prepareinstallcrowbar installcrowbar allocate waitcloud proposal testsetup run_cct

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
admin=crowbar$hw_number cloud=qa$hw_number tempestoptions="-t -s"
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GMx and without TESTHEAD unset TESTHEAD export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore cd /home/jenkins freshadminvm_cloud6 $admin qcow2 sleep 100 # time for the admin VM to boot
# rest of code runs on admin node: env | grep -e networking -e libvirt -e cloud > mkcloud.config scp mkcloud.config root@$admin: ret=0
ssh root@$admin " export cloud=$cloud ; export UPDATEREPOS=$UPDATEREPOS ; export UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL=$UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL ; export TESTHEAD=$TESTHEAD ; export cloudsource=$cloudsource ; export libvirt_type=$libvirt_type ; export nodenumber=$nodenumber ; export hacloud=$hacloud ; export clusterconfig=$clusterconfig ; export runner_url=$runner_url ; export commands="$commands" "'
wget --no-check-certificate -Oqa_crowbarsetup.sh "$runner_url"
[ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && export updatesteps="addupdaterepo runupdate"
timeout --signal=ALRM 150m bash -x -c ". qa_crowbarsetup.sh ; onadmin_runlist $commands" ' || ret=$?
echo "mkphyscloud ret=$ret" exit $ret
